column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////We picked the garlic shrimp for starters and all i can say about this delightful little appetizer is "yum!"  It's a bit juvenile but the shrimp were perfect.  Second Old Fashioned and we asked Ben for his favorites on the menu
column2: as far as appetizers went.  He suggested the peppered duck and goat cheese terrine and the Main Lobster.  We went with the lobster but I will be back for that goat cheese goodness.
